resources.string: You wake up face down in sand, everything is a bit blurry. There is something in your bag, which weapon did you choose again?
You wake up hanging in the canopy of some trees, everything is a bit blurry. There is something in your bag, which weapon did you choose again?
You wake up at the mouth of a deep cave, everything is a bit blurry. There is something in your bag, which weapon did you choose again?
